about_the_game:
This demo gives an initial taste of what the full game is like, and contains the first 5 or so chapters.

About This Game

WTC 3 is the concluding chapter of the Welcome To... Chichester series.

The Story

What was originally a different, but enjoyable holiday soon takes a turn for the worse as your tourist guide falls ill; Grendel, still refusing to unveil her secrets, takes out her frustrations on the local pet population and you find that Misericordia is on your tail seeking revenge for all the perceived injustices that you've done to her.

Will you be able to make it back to America in one piece ?

Your last day has arrived.
